website_summaries.verdict: A dependable cordless leaf blower that is designed for lighter duty yard needs.
pros: This affordably priced model delivers up to 390 cu
ft. of air per minute at 110 MPH
The ergonomic grip, variable speed trigger, and cruise control are all much-welcomed features
The battery can be fully charged in a little over an hour
cons: Although this unit is manufactured for lighter duty tasks, the shorter battery life can be frustrating

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cordless Blower!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried after ordering this blower due to some reviewers indicating it didn't have enough power. I have now used it for about a couple of months and I'm extremely satisfied. It has plenty of power to blow grass clippings and road debris from my driveway, gutters, and concrete patio (see attached video). With the battery fully charged, the blower lasts between 18 to 20 minutes, which is plenty of time to me to do the clean up after mowing. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Anne A.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's light and powerful. I was surprised at the power from a battery powered blower. I use it to clean out my garage and a low lying portion of the roof. I see neighbors with blow dryer powered blowers and the leaves hardly move. This one blows them away well. Honestly, it's a big kid toy. The hose weighs almost nothing so most of the weight is from the battery. If you're doing light yard work, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: After buying and using this I am very pleased. I used to use my cord blower that was a detach from my craftsman shop vac. This blower does not produce the higher amount of air (mph) but it MOVES a lot of air and really makes dusting and clean ups outside pretty easy. I like the variable speed switch as well. I have a smaller size yard and it’s perfect with the amount of power and battery time allotted.
customer_reviews.author: Roe1577

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Powerful and Green. What's Your Question?
customer_reviews.text: Was not convinced this could ever beat the Black and Decker battery powered leaf blower when I purchased this item. I chose it because it was on sale on that day I ordered. I'm also attempting to be frugal and I'm glad I went for it! This is definitely a black+decker quality item. In fact for my needs it's better. The charge lasts. Which is awesome. For a couple of days with moderate to heavy use. I did not use it for a period of continuous hours however, your owners manual should call it out should that matter. Super lightweight and powerful enough for a residential use. Go for it. You won't feel buyer's remorse.
customer_reviews.author: chefRANDOM

customer_reviews.title: Blower probably OK.  Support from Greenworks is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the front blower tube piece. I have contacted Greenworks twice about this and they sent the rear blower tube! I walked through the parts diagram with both people at Greenworks, and the second person even confirmed that the first person ordered the wrong replacement part - then sent me the same wrong replacement part!!! The blower seems like it would be great, but since I only have half a tube and the Greenworks support keeps messing up - I can't fully test it..
customer_reviews.author: Rusanowski

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of units shipped with an old battery and Greenworks replaced it with an even older one !
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE TO MY REVIEW. In my review, I noted that the blower was received with a battery that was already two years old, and therefore already deteriorated in storage. Also, the Charge Level Indicator on the battery did not work. Greenworks sent me a replacement battery. The Charge Level Indicator works, BUT the battery was manufactured in October 2015 and is already THREE years old...... worse than the Original one ! This is the last Greenworks product that I will buy through Amazon, where I cannot check the product before delivery. Shame !
customer_reviews.author: Jetlag

customer_reviews.title: Average lightweight blower
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as a gas blower or even most electric corded blowers. Very light. Noise is not bad and is a higher pitched frequency. Battery lasts about 15 minutes. Trigger allows you to vary the speed but frankly doesn't have a great range so you are usually at full or off. Needs more power to be useful for larger jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Expertreviewer

customer_reviews.title: It is just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The blower works great for quick jobs like blowing off the deck or blowing out the garage but you better do it quick because the battery will not last for more than five minutes at a time. My battery sticks tight when placed in the unit and is a pain to remove but I think that is just my unit. The other downside is that the batteries are expensive if you need a replacement. Based on my experience I would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Kelly

customer_reviews.title: awesome tool. battery lasts long and I am able ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome tool .battery lasts long and I am able to use it on my entire front and back patio plus my whole driveway with power to spare ..it does a great job on piles of pine needles and oak tree leaves ..I also use it on my roof ...very impressed .the variable speed trigger makes it easy to "herd" the piles in the direction that I want them to go ...
customer_reviews.author: david Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Works well on dry leaves
customer_reviews.text: I have a plug-in blower as well, but hate dealing with the cord. I have a large driveway, and with a 100ft cord I have to switch plugs once to do the whole thing. Plus, it's a pain to reel in the cord. This thing works very well on dry leaves, but wet leaves are a tough slog. If things are super dry, I can do do my whole driveway on one 2AH battery, but usually I run out with a little to go. You don't realize how much that cord cramp your style until you get one of these. Now I take the blower out to do small jobs that I just wouldn't do before.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gehring

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for an electric blower
customer_reviews.text: It has plenty of power to do general clean up and to blow off a driveway or patio or deck. You won’t use this if you have a lot of leaves and the battery life is prohibitive in that regard as well. Overall though it’s nice to clean up after cutting the grass without mixing fuel or the general maintenance that comes with a gas blower.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ventured into the realm of battery operated lawn equipment...was a little concerned with the power and battery life but...It works great! I bought both the 40v trimmer and leaf blower. Both perform very well and have more than enough power and life to handle all my needs. I had a stihl trimmer before but was just tire of it always being a pain to start. With these 40v units its simple lug and chug!
customer_reviews.author: JOSH

customer_reviews.title: Powerful does the job, battery life pathetic.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life could have been better at 2.0Ah it lasted 5 minutes. Response from tech support suggested I get in touch with the Co sbd ut should just between 15-25 minutes on a fully charged battery. When I wrote to customer service they told me 5 minutes at full power was what should be expected. Mixed responses from Co about the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Battery will require replacement $$$
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that the battery will not charge after less than a year of use - the charger's red light on the right never stops blinking. A new battery costs almost as much as I paid for the entire machine, battery and charger. If I had known about the poor battery life I never would have made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Weak blower, short battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this but very disappointed. It will clear a small layer of leaves but not suited to trying to clean up a yard. Working on a 1 inch pile of leaves it will whittle away the top but barely moves the bottom layer. Battery dies after 20 minutes of use, so unless you plan on investing in a half dozen batteries it's not worth it. Should've spent the money for a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Battery is not great
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy another. The battery does not last very long and it gets hot. I couldn't get a it to recharge the other day. I tried again again, finally it recharged. I used to have a Black and Decker cordless, it was much better than this one, more power and the battery lasted longer. It just took longer to recharge. So, boo, hiss to the Greenworks
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R

customer_reviews.title: As good as a corded blower
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my black and decker 40v blower, this one is much stronger. It rivals my corded blower and the lack of a cord is phenomenal. I'm gradually replacing my corded tools with cordless ones now that battery life and power has improved so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amarillo by morning

customer_reviews.title: Not great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blower for the price, speed and reviews. I charged the battery and it showed green - okay to use. I found it odd the the battery indicator button didn't work. I proceeded to use and the blower worked for a bit and then kept timing out. I plug the battery back and and the green light shows it is charged but battery indicator still not working -will probably be returning - very frustrating!@
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Shanley

customer_reviews.title: Good performance for the money, love it.
customer_reviews.text: For a quick blow off of debris on hard surfaces and leaf removal from landscaping around house, it works well. Much better CFM's than a 20V black and decker unit. Mine came with the 2.5 Amp hour battery on my purchase. This unit screams, little uncomfortable using, due to high pitch motor, so I wear ear protection, its just more comfortable. Charger works quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford D. Main

customer_reviews.title: The product description should disclose product noise level
customer_reviews.text: Just got it but....Oh my goodness...this thing sounds like an A-10 Warthog jet taking off... Holly mackerel, I hope I can get used to that because, the machine does work well and, as described otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: There are better brands more reliable
customer_reviews.text: After 22 months (used 30min every other week), battery is dead. Tried to contact product support but they ignore you basically. It deserves two stars because it last that long, but not worth the price in comparison to other products.
customer_reviews.author: Fabricio Ikeda

customer_reviews.title: The description is accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy blower to have to take care of spilled soil, sawdust, leaves on the patio, etc. For bigger jobs I use my Toro electric blower. Only when I get carried away doing more than I intended to I exhaust the battery. I love the variable speed feature to finesse the debris in my decorative rocks!
customer_reviews.author: DHO

customer_reviews.title: A Pretty Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: I received this about two weeks ago and have used it only twice, but for the small area that I have to clean it did the area 2 x on the one charge, which I estimated to be approximately 30-35 minutes. I found it to be quieter than another brand that I tried that had a much shorter warranty period, (90 days) and came in at a higher base price. An extended warranty was offered for an up charge, which made this a better option. This has a four year warranty on the unit and two years on the battery and charger.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilkonski

customer_reviews.title: My first leaf blower, meets my expectation.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and appears to be of good quality. It's more powerful than the corded B&D blower I borrowed, which is surprising. It's noticeable more powerful when battery is fully charged; probably a bit heavier than some corded model due to battery. Didn't time how long it lasts; had to re-charge battery in-between fall leaves cleaning but I expect this before I bought the product. Ideally you want 2 batteries for small yards so you can finish the job in one shot.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Guo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: I use this leaf blower to clean out the dry van trailer before and after pickups and deliveries. I'm a CDL driver and saving time for hours of service is of the essence. Many shippers require a clean trailer and a broom is not as thorough as the blower.
customer_reviews.author: Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, slow support
customer_reviews.text: My box arrived appearing to be missing a piece - the second, end-piece of the blower nozzle. I went to the support site and asked for the missing part, but it took weeks for them to get back to me. Turns out the second piece was tucked way inside the first piece where I couldn’t see it. All is well now and have used the unit for several weeks - it’s a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Kirke S. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Very bad first impression
customer_reviews.text: As seen in other low star reviews, the battery died within minutes of use after being fully charged. When the battery is docked in the charger, the fully charged light continues to come on however the blower will not start. Will update as my experience changes but at the moment, I'm incredibly dissatisfied having bought 2 of these (1 as a gift) and having to wait over 25 minutes on the Greenworks line just to finally give up and send an email. Very bad first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great for lite work load, lacks power for heaver tasks
customer_reviews.text: It's great to not have to drag around a cord, so you are not limited to a certain distance from an outlet. We have artificial turf in our side yard. It's a play area for our dogs. It doesn't have the strength to move pine needles out of the turf. Concrete areas in our courtyard are easily cleaned by it as well as our front porch. It is a little unwieldy due to the weight of the battery. It is also some what cumbersome since I'm left handed.
customer_reviews.author: John Swansby

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great product, but terrible customer support
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived missing the rear blower tube. Tried to use "Contact Us" form on website. Response was "Unable to submit your request. Please, try again later". Tried calling customer support. Gave up after a half hour of on hold music. It's really too bad because the quality of the construction looks excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight, noise free blower
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Powerful enough to blow the debris off our patio and take care of lawn clippings scattered on the sidewalk. It’s nice not having to contend with the noise of a gas mower.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hedding

customer_reviews.title: Not bad so far
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I feel like the battery should last longer, and when it's running low the blower starts struggling. I was going to get a weed wacker and a hedge trimmer also but there is no way you could run more than 1 thing at a time before charging the battery anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tool about twice a month in 3 seasons since April 2017 with no issues. The batteries have a good usage life. I am very happy with all the Greenworks products and their customer service takes their job seriously if you read my review of their weed whacker.
customer_reviews.author: vasimo

customer_reviews.title: It's just a leaf blower, right?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cordless Blower along with Chainsaw and String Trimmer for maintenance work at a Cottage on Lake Michigan. Blower moved the wet leaves out quickly from under the decking, so I proceeded to do a summer leaf collection/clean up. Yes it takes some battery power. but it did it's part so easily, that I was motivated to do my part. Very pleased with this Tool.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Very handy. Glad I finally bought it.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much I use this blower now. I have a Stihl blower that I have used for years, and works very well. "But" gas power and quirky to start and keep running. Now I just grab the Greenworks blower anytime i need it. This time of year (winter) leaves are falling constantly. Battery life on the 2Ah is pretty good. Did end up buying a second 4Ah Greenworks referb battery for the larger than usual jobs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mason

customer_reviews.title: great leaf blower!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this leaf blower after borrowing a similar one from my neighbor. I chose this one instead of her brand because of a bit more horsepower for just a few more dollars. If I take the nozzle off, the strength of the blowing power is greater so I'm able to blow grass clippings off of the lawn. The one I borrowed didn't work nearly as well. I am totally satisfied and glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blower - Totally Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I own a large electric blower/vac but the cord is always getting in my way or limiting where I can work. It is also heavy. This blower is light weight, has great blowing power, and I can take it anywhere I need to go and not get hung up on anything! The battery comes charged to 50% so you will need to charge it. It charges pretty fast and has an indicator you can check to see how much charge you have left. Totally impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful- I paid $189 for a refurbished (did not know it would be refurbished) blower that barely works.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well, isn't too heavy, balance seems good. It does what I bought it for, light blowing, it's compact, stores in a small space. It's not overly loud, not sure about battery life but that's not a big deal for me, if it needs a charge I'll stop for a beer!
customer_reviews.author: Full Timer

customer_reviews.title: can't bear its battery
customer_reviews.text: The leaf blower works great, both leaves and small twigs can be blown away. What I complain is it is a bit heavy for a lady, And the most thing I can't bear Is its battery. I bought 3A,but it can only use less than 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Keepmyheart

customer_reviews.title: Good little blower
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this blower for couple of months now and I absolutely love it. So far so good on the battery life. It packs a lot of punch and cleans things nicely off my deck and driveway. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great you need a spare battery to finish job l would recommend
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great blower! Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blower! It’s both more lightweight AND more powerful than our previous Greenworks blower. Lighter unit, lighter battery. But strong enough to blow pine needles off a rocky area that used to be difficult to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith McLendon

customer_reviews.title: This BLOWER will BLOW your socks off!
customer_reviews.text: Blowing leaves is now FUN! No more cords...no hassle...just easy to handle, light weight, dependable, long lasting battery and down right a JOY to use! Battery charges quickly, too. Every Green Works product I own is my very favorite!
customer_reviews.author: PCarlson

customer_reviews.title: NO cords!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor brought his over for me to use....and I went inside and bought one for my husband! Easy, lightweight and NO cords to limit you! So much easier that sweeping, especially if you're on a slope or steep roof.
customer_reviews.author: LLA

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works pretty well on grass clippings and leaves. Provides lots of air. Battery life seems to be pretty decent too.
customer_reviews.author: boon xiong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blower
customer_reviews.text: This blower provides ample blowing power and easy to use. The adjustable power feature is nice to have when blowing leaves on bark or grass areas.
customer_reviews.author: chai

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: Competent item. Well made. Battery life is good. Not the most powerful, but better than I expected. Don't expect to clean out the dense gardens. Use a gas Bower for that. If you have only lawn, you're gold.
customer_reviews.author: WLB

customer_reviews.title: The best blower for small jobs!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, seriously? Why didn't I buy this 2 years ago??? Still have my backpack blower, but for smaller jobs, like blowing off my patio and blowing off the bed of my truck, this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Powerful !!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to keep the driveway cleaned off from the beginning's of fall leaves. This thing is powerful, it even moves acorns. Really enjoying this unit, plus its sounds like a jet engine. Just using it, brought two neighbors over that went out and purchased the same unit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Smith

customer_reviews.title: good finish
customer_reviews.text: this is a great deal. the blower is very strong. sweeps your grass away. very light weight. nothing to really assemble. came quickly and battery lasts a long time ive never really used the blower longer than 10-15 minutes but battery has never been depleted after use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: Great blower. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blower and it has plenty of strength to clear grass leaves and debris from sidewalks, decks, patios etc. with no problem. Not to be used as a leaf blower for moving large volumes. It will definitely move some dry leaves from lawn and garden areas though for smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Good lead blower for the price. Battery life is GARBAGE. I can maybe get 10 minutes before the battery it comes with is completely dead. Definitely consider a bigger battery, that than that the tool itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job, but absolutely not worth the money. I bought this because I love Greenworks products. This leaf blower however was relatively weak, and very loud. I used my neighbors $30 corded blower, which was much more powerful and less noisey. Returned this to use a corded blower and long extension cord for much cheaper. This would be good for someone who just needs to clear sidewalks or concrete and you are too far from an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works good for my eighty foot driveway and back patio, battery life is limited to 15 minuets as described. Not enough power for wet leafs in the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Saint

customer_reviews.title: Works - but very loud with short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected except it is VERY loud (nasty high pitched sound - louder than most blowers) and the battery life is pretty pathetic. But hey, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Badger

customer_reviews.title: No Extension Cords
customer_reviews.text: I have the weed eater, mower and now the blower. I hate extension cords. I have a small back yard with two little dogs so I need to complete the yard work quickly. With these I can cut, edge and blow off the pavers in about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard56

customer_reviews.title: It really blows
customer_reviews.text: I had 3 batteries and was able to cycle them running each about 50% then recharge and was able to run about 3 hours before I had to stop and let them do a full recharge. If I ran them until completely discharged the battery would heat up and wouldn't recharge until they cooled down taking about an Hour to recharge. Does a good job of blowing.
customer_reviews.author: eyecatcher

customer_reviews.title: conveience
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so my employees may easily blow off the entrance to our business. Very light and easy to use. (Now I do not have to drag out the cords and put them away).
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality blower
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. The battery lasts a long time, and the velocity is just fine for my purposes. What a time saver. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: freshnewday

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The battery holds a charge when it is stored until the next use and that is a great option. I love it, should have found this tool sooner! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: David Burris Sr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Battery is no longer holding a charge - don't know if its the battery or the charger - I charge the battery over night and then only works for 30 seconds before having to turn off and on - would like to receive a new battery if possible, used only bout 12 times - very disappointed considering the price I paid:(
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Santangelo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & portable.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Should have gotten rid of the electric one a long time ago! ALSO recharges in about 30 minutes. You NEED this!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick use in outdoor spaces that need frequent clean-up.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blower that suits our needs perfectly. We needed lightweight, battery powered blower for quick use on our patio and around pool area that is convenient and easily stored. Stronger than expected and light enough for almost anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cordless blower
customer_reviews.text: I just received the blower today and have already used it!! found it very convenient and lightweight. think it is great
customer_reviews.author: Betty L. Driskell

customer_reviews.title: Great BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I give this as many stars as needed. Its not heavy, and can be used almost everywhere. It's a great buy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blower for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received the blower without the battery so I returned it and repurchased. Second blower came quickly and had the battery and charger included. It performs as described and for the price I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred F.

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this GreenWorks Cordless Leaf Blower to replace a heavy, corded unit. I have used it twice now and am very satisfied with the purchase. It is lightweight and very powerful. Packaging was excellent and shipping was timely.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckB

customer_reviews.title: It did not work the second time I charged the ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not work the second time I charged the battery , It kept cutting on and off. I almost sent it back because it didn’t have enough power for me but I decided to keep it because it worked OK but then when I had the on and off problem I thought well it’s going to have to go back probably will get another one with more power .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davis

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: same battery as mower. Greenworks makes excellent quality products. Little heavier than my last blower due to larger battery. This thing blows up a storm
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS MACCHIO

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about a year ago worked like a charm, ended up buying a second one since we have a big property. Works very good considering the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Krissia Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Battery Powered Leaf Blower
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Powerful unit. Light weight. Good value for the money. Perfect for my yard clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Bossler Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for cleaning up on our patio and sidewalks. It works really good and it is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Honey Farms

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick light jobs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and light weight. Not enough power to do bulk leaves but great to clear off grass trimmings, dust, and dry dirt or dry your washed car.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher F. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We use this a lot - like multiple times a week - especially right now as leaves begin to fall. It has great power - we even use it to blow leaves off of our pool cover and it does a great job. The recharging station is intuitive. Our kids like using it too since blowing stuff around is sort of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Glenn

customer_reviews.title: low power
customer_reviews.text: nice blower low power price too high could I get a better battery jerry
customer_reviews.author: JERRY  BERKOUF

customer_reviews.title: Great blower for keeping back steps and front sidewalk clear of dirt and leaves
customer_reviews.text: We use this daily. The battery life good, but if you are as particular as my wife, you will want to buy a second battery so the blower is always ready to go. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: mark in kc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: 5/5 for what it is. Definitely not as good as a gas blower but that’s not what I was expecting. It works great on wet or dry leaves on hard surfaces but not wet leaves on grass.
customer_reviews.author: John5

customer_reviews.title: Nice blower
customer_reviews.text: Tool is fantastic, has to work more on the batteries to weak and very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Tamargo

customer_reviews.title: easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed my daughter's blower and liked it so much, I ordered one just like it. Lightweight for ladies with the battery included. I put it all together and charged it without my husband's help. Now no more sweeping off the sidewalk and patio. A 20-30 minute sweeping job has turned into 5 min. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good but loud
customer_reviews.text: Good for removing water on cars but loud as fk! Cant use it in my complex. The tip could be a little smaller for more pushing power
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and Does the job great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 4 months and it does great for quickly cleaning out my garage as well as a long sidewalk and driveway (my driveway can fit four vehicles). As well as blow away leaves and grass clippings from my foundation just great! It does all of those areas on my average size property without the battery dying so I'm Well pleased with this Light weight product!
customer_reviews.author: H & J

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: wish we had bought it alot sooner use it almost every day in garage and on my back porch wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this leaf blower. Easy to use and very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: TraPhe

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and so much more quiet than our neighbors!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower !!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for everything. Patio ,blowing leaves out of garden and pathways. Having variable speeds is nice... The battery is lasting for a while, which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cats2

customer_reviews.title: Great product once again
customer_reviews.text: Great blower works well. I own just about every tool in this collection there great.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Maas

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to mower
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a 2.5 amp battery . Has plenty of power , and love the cruise control . It allowes you to hold any speed with out using the trigger .
customer_reviews.author: J. V.

customer_reviews.title: Parts are missing.
customer_reviews.text: I got the package all in one piece but I only got one piece of rubbing that attaches to the blower. All of the pieces were not in the box. Thank you getting these parts to me. Gloria Tairney 943-693-1288
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA Tairney 843-693-1288

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, reasonable price..
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this cordless blower. It has so much more power than our old one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Quite and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Didnt know what to expect but I own the chain saw and weed wacker so i had the batteries. Awesome blower, great for grass clippings and cleaning the deck off. Nice and quite too. Don't know about actually blowing leaves in the fall though, we'll see...
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Light and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: It is light. I don't need to plug it in, fill it with gas or oi. or crank the motor to start. I pick it up in my workshop and immediately start cleaning my patio and deck. The air flow is powerful--CAT 2, right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good running time on battery
customer_reviews.text: Very strong blower !! Great price and great quality love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit larger than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it for blowing off walk, driveway, patio & blowing out garage. I like L-I battery.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A

customer_reviews.title: Great powerful blower!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cordless blower! Very powerful and easy to maneuver!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with my new blower, so pleased that I followed up with the purchase of hedge trimmers from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. It does what I want ti to do. I do not depend on it for blowing acres, but it is great for driveways and small areas.
customer_reviews.author: Larry C Hines

customer_reviews.title: Free from cords!
customer_reviews.text: Quite effective, battery life allows most tasks, onboard battery indicator really helps. Axial design should last beyond the 4 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: LTS2LRN

customer_reviews.title: Strong quality blower but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great blower with good power. Decent battery. Pretty heavy for 70 yr old. Would get a five except it is so hard to pull battery out
customer_reviews.author: Poodley

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Serves my purpose of blowing off deck, driveway, and sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last as long as would like but recharges quickly
customer_reviews.text: More powerful than expected. Battery doesn't last as long as would like but recharges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: doncat

product_meta.title: Greenworks 40V Cordless Jet Leaf Blower, 110 MPH - 390 CFM , 2.0 AH Battery Included 2400802
product_meta.description: Size:2Ah Battery and Charger| Style:Jet BlowerThe GreenWorks 40V system is the largest collection of premium lawn tools withup to 25 or more tools on one battery platform. Save by buying tool only models, or with battery. There is no task that can't be completed with the GreenWorks G-MAX 40V system
feature_bullets: Finish your project with up to 14 minutes of runtime on high with a 2.5Ah battery
390 CFM / 110 MPH powers through the toughest debris
Reduced fatigue with comfort over mold grip, variable speed trigger, and cruise control
Charger provides full recharge in 75 minutes putting you back to work
4-year tool warranty and 2-year battery warranty protects your investment
